description: Many of those on the list found in Argentina may have had cash stolen from Jewish victims.
title: Nazi name lists in Argentina may reveal loot in Swiss bank
title_page: Nazi name lists in Argentina may reveal loot in Swiss bank - BBC News
maintext: In a statement on its website, the centre says many of the Nazis listed in the Argentinian files "contributed to one or more bank accounts at the Schweizerische Kreditanstalt, which became the Credit Suisse bank".
